name: REROUTE (clxrffdman, stargyaru, Harrison_S)
description:
REROUTE

Enjoy a simple game of Snake --- that may threaten your life. 

Created in 24 Hours for the Microgame Jam.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move Snake

Credits

Programmer - Calex Raffield

3D Artist - Harrison Scapellati

2D Artist - Annalivia Martin-Straw

Notes

Win or Lose: You fail either way.
